entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: ToOrderedDictionary #110286
    Future
  • System.Formats.Nrbf.Tests timeouts #110285
  • ImmutableHashSet properties allows collection initializer usage without error but initializer has no effect #110279
  • build release/9.0 android and ios local failed #110278

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: CollectionMarshal.AsArraySegment<T>(List<T>) overload #110275
  • System.Text.Json 9.0 error #110283
  • Double serialization in net481 accuracy problems #110276
  • CreateDelegate is failing for value/struct types after upgrade to 9.0 #110280
  • The name passed to `DbProviderFactories.GetFactory` is case sensitive but the error message indicates the name is "invariant" which isn't correct #110236

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable AltJits build for LoongArch64 and RiscV64 #110282
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Include correct `HResult` in `IOException` during preallocation when the disk is full #110281
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

Merged

  • Allow optimizing mask conversions on x64 as well #110195
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update unhandled exception handler API to match approved shape. #110254
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Only define _XOPEN_SOURCE in configurecompiler.cmake (for consistency) #110092
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • JIT: enable removal of try/catch if the try can't throw. #110273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rename {CLR,DOTNET}_ICU/OPENSSL_VERSION_OVERRIDE #110259
    area-System.Globalization, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110211
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Non-PGO calli/delegate call transformation #109679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add pMethod param to getHelperFtn EE-JIT API #110267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT_CountProfile: Avoid BSR instruction for low counts #110258
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RuntimeAsync] Make Async marker a bit in MethodImpl flags #110274
    area-Meta
  • Remove usage of HP libunwind on Apple platforms #110023
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for MacCatalyst/iOS simulator #109928
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, community-contribution
  • Optimize JTRUE(cast_helper EQ/NE null) expansion #110272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for emitting Source Link data #110270
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Check if lock is orphaned in GetThreadOwningMonitorLock #107168
    area-VM-coreclr
